blogPost.excerpt: Can't spend thousands of dollars on premium fonts and tired of using the same plain Google fonts as everyone else? Fontshare brings a collection of high quality fonts 100% Free for both Commercial & Personal Use.
blogPost.body: Can't spend thousands of dollars on premium fonts and tired of using the same plain Google fonts as everyone else? Fontshare brings a collection of high quality fonts 100% Free for both Commercial & Personal Use.
blogPost.title: Fontshare - High quality fonts 100% free for commercial and personal use
blogPost.author: Yash Bhardwaj

localize.description: 不能花费数千美元的高级字体，并厌倦了使用相同的普通谷歌字体作为其他人？Fontshare带来了高质量的字体集合100％免费的商业和个人使用。
localize.tagline: 高质量的字体，100%免费供商业和个人使用。

localize.description: 不能花費數千美元的高級字體，並厭倦了使用相同的普通谷歌字體作爲其他人？Fontshare帶來了高質量的字體集合100％免費的商業和個人使用。
localize.tagline: 高質量的字體，100%免費供商業和個人使用。

previous.excerpt: Ennerate (YC W21) does business valuations for small and medium sized traditional businesses (plumbers, manufacturing, etc.) for 5x faster and 10x cheaper than existing services. Users upload financials, take a survey, and our models generate the valuation.
previous.title: Ennerate - Automated business valuations for 'Main Street' companies

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）为中小型传统企业（水电工、制造业等）做商业估值，比现有服务快5倍，便宜10倍。用户上传财务资料，进行调查，我们的模型就会生成估值。
localize.tagline: 为 "大街 "公司进行自动商业评估。

localize.description: Ennerate（YC W21）爲中小型傳統企業（水電工、製造業等）做商業估值，比現有服務快5倍，便宜10倍。用戶上傳財務資料，進行調查，我們的模型就會生成估值。
localize.tagline: 爲 "大街 "公司進行自動商業評估。

next.excerpt: The world is filled with too much noise around China. Meho (“very good” in Shanghainese) is here to help you contextualize China and equip you with hands-on Chinese skills, so you won’t miss out on the opportunities brought by the development of China.
next.title: Meho - Understand and communicate with China like never before!

localize.description: 围绕着中国，世界充满了太多的噪音。美好（上海话 "很好"）在这里帮助你了解中国的背景，让你掌握实际的中文技能，从而不会错过中国发展带来的机遇。
localize.tagline: 了解并与中国进行前所未有的沟通!

localize.description: 圍繞着中國，世界充滿了太多的噪音。美好（上海話 "很好"）在這裏幫助你瞭解中國的背景，讓你掌握實際的中文技能，從而不會錯過中國發展帶來的機遇。
localize.tagline: 瞭解並與中國進行前所未有的溝通!
